items.sentence: I thought maybe Tom had already tried to do that.
I won\'t waste time trying to change Tom\'s mind.
Tom put the first aid kit back where he found it.
Tom took an umbrella to school, but Mary didn\'t.
I called my friend after arriving at the station.
It would probably be wise to do that by yourself.
It\'s no secret Tom and Mary are having problems.
It\'s rumored that they are going to get married.
It\'s unlikely that anything serious will happen.
It\'s more complicated than I originally thought.
